description:
PyVideo.org has undergone significant changes over the past year. It's
changed teams, infrastructure, and looks. Come hear about the progress
the PyVideo team is making and the direction in which PyVideo is headed.

Paul Logston Bio
----------------

Paul Logston is a New York City based developer. He helps organize and
run the NYC Python, Learn Python NYC, and PyGotham events that take
place in NYC. He works at 15Five and teaches at Columbia.
title: State of the PyVideo
